Kelly's Conservation Forest

East Bush Lookout

The lookout point has a simple bench where people can sit and recuperate from the steepish climb up to it. There is also an impressive looking Australian Gum tree that acts as a backdrop.

View from the lookout towards Stoke and the Waimea Estuary. Rabbit Island can be seen in the middle right of the picture.
